title: How to Make Mint Chutney

steps.headline: Wash the greens in cold water, and pack the mint and coriander leaves into the measuring cups.
Blend all of the ingredients together on medium speed in a blender; blend until the mixture has a smooth consistency.
Pour the mixture into a bowl, and serve.

text: Wash the greens in cold water, and pack the mint and coriander leaves into the measuring cups.  Blend all of the ingredients together on medium speed in a blender; blend until the mixture has a smooth consistency.  Pour the mixture into a bowl, and serve.  Finished.
